name: Destiny HERO - Deadlyguy
desc:
1 "Destiny HERO" monster + 1 DARK Effect Monster
You can discard 1 card (Quick Effect); send 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, all "Destiny HERO" monsters you currently control gain 200 ATK for each "Destiny HERO" monster currently in your GY, until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Destiny HERO - Deadlyguy" once per turn.
